DERBY-522
1) Updates client to look for statements that begin with comments and to ignore the comments when deciding the kind of statement that is being executed. 2) Changes ij to only strip comments for client versions less than 10.2 3) Adds test cases for statements that begin with comments to the jdbcapi/nullSQLText.java test 4) Updates masters
